name: Zac & Mia
overview: "Zac and Mia", based on the novel by A.J. Betts, about 2 teens battling cancer in the same hospital. In the real world, Zac and Mia would have pretty much nothing in common, but in the hospital, where they're the only 2 teens on the ward, they develop an unbreakable bond. If cancer is the variable that changed everything, the only constant is their ever-deepening need for one another.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: "Zac and Mia", based on the novel by A.J. Betts, about 2 teens battling cancer in the same hospital. In the real world, Zac and Mia would have pretty much nothing in common, but in the hospital, where they're the only 2 teens on the ward, they develop an unbreakable bond. If cancer is the variable that changed everything, the only constant is their ever-deepening need for one another.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: "Zac and Mia", based on the novel by A.J. Betts, about 2 teens battling cancer in the same hospital. In the real world, Zac and Mia would have pretty much nothing in common, but in the hospital, where they're the only 2 teens on the ward, they develop an unbreakable bond. If cancer is the variable that changed everything, the only constant is their ever-deepening need for one another.

episodes.name: X Factor
episodes.overview: In the midst of a monotonous period of protective isolation, Zac is pleasantly surprised when Mia, his new neighbor on the oncology floor, turns out to be nothing like he'd expected.

episodes.name: Treat Yo Self
episodes.overview: Mia delays her first chemotherapy treatment to accommodate an important visitor on Valentine's Day, and later, in the dark of a long day's night, Zac does what he can to bring a smile to her face.

episodes.name: Friend Quest
episodes.overview: A surprise visit from Zac's best friend Cam serves as the reality check that Zac doesn't need, and on the other side of the wall, Mia inquires about the voice behind her late night lullaby.

episodes.name: Make-Over & Out
episodes.overview: As things are looking up, an unexpected guest arriving at just the wrong time leaves Zac feeling hopeless.

episodes.name: Starboy
episodes.overview: Zac lets Mia in on his private hobby, and ultimately brightens up her otherwise lonesome night in the hospital.

episodes.name: Rocky Road
episodes.overview: Make A Wish officially grants Zac a wish, and an ensuing late night video chat with Mia takes an unexpected twist.

episodes.name: Thera-Flu
episodes.overview: Zac suffers the unfortunate consequences of his recent impulsive decision, and Mia opens up to a new confidante.

episodes.name: Coma Chameleon
episodes.overview: Zac follows Mia on a spiritual journey in his fever dreamlike state.

episodes.name: Give/Take
episodes.overview: Zac is enjoying his 18th birthday until he receives crushing news, and a stubborn Mia prioritizes prom over her health.

episodes.name: M-I-A
episodes.overview: In a spontaneous turn of events, Mia realizes it's time to put someone else's needs before her own and surprises Zac.

episodes.name: Make The Cut
episodes.overview: Zac's possible release day takes a turn that nobody sees coming.

episodes.name: Last Dance
episodes.overview: As Mia begins to wrap her head around her new situation, Zac receives clarity on his Make A Wish.
